Scrape Park Factors from FanGraphs.com

Source: R/fangraphs.R
fg_park.Rd

This function allows you to scrape park factors for a given season from FanGraphs.com.

This function allows you to scrape park factors by handedness from FanGraphs.com for a given single year.

fg_park(yr)

fg_park_hand(yr)

Arguments

yr

Season for which you want to scrape the park factors.

Examples

fg_park(2013)

#> Data courtey of FanGraphs.com. Please consider supporting FanGraphs by purchasing a membership: https://plus.fangraphs.com/product/fangraphs-membership/?switch-subscription=254671&item=85029&_wcsnonce=3e893e9b53&auto-switch=true

fg_park_hand(2013)

#> Data courtey of FanGraphs.com. Please consider supporting FanGraphs by purchasing a membership: https://plus.fangraphs.com/product/fangraphs-membership/?switch-subscription=254671&item=85029&_wcsnonce=3e893e9b53&auto-switch=true
